languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, я молился Бессмертному о вашем скорейшем возвращении! Подданные Даргонуса держались до последнего, однако натиск врагов Человечества... был яростен и беспощаден".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, я молился Бессмертному о вашем скорейшем возвращении! Подданные Даргонуса держались до последнего, однако натиск врагов Человечества... был яростен и беспощаден".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я молился Бессмертному о вашем скорейшем возвращении! Подданные Даргонуса держались до последнего, однако натиск врагов Человечества... был яростен и беспощаден".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

languages.text: 「陛下、御身がお戻りになるのをイモータルに祈り続けておりました！ダルゴナスの人々は最後まで戦い抜きましたが、人類の敵の猛攻は…凶暴で残虐でした」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、御身がお戻りになるのをイモータルに祈り続けておりました！ダルゴナスの人々は最後まで戦い抜きましたが、人類の敵の猛攻は…凶暴で残虐でした」

languages.text: “大人，我一直在向永生不朽的神皇祈祷您快些回来！达戈努斯的人民战斗到了最后一刻，但人类之敌的攻击实在是……太过血腥、太过残忍。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我一直在向永生不朽的神皇祈祷您快些回来！达戈努斯的人民战斗到了最后一刻，但人类之敌的攻击实在是……太过血腥、太过残忍。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡rezaba al Inmortal para que volviera cuanto antes! La gente de Dargonus ha luchado hasta el fin, pero el asalto de los enemigos de la Humanidad... era despiadado y brutal».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡rezaba al Inmortal para que volviera cuanto antes! La gente de Dargonus ha luchado hasta el fin, pero el asalto de los enemigos de la Humanidad... era despiadado y brutal».

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'ai tant prié l'Immortel pour votre prompt retour ! Les habitants de Dargonus se sont battus jusqu'à leur dernier souffle, mais les forces ennemies étaient... brutales et impitoyables. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'ai tant prié l'Immortel pour votre prompt retour ! Les habitants de Dargonus se sont battus jusqu'à leur dernier souffle, mais les forces ennemies étaient... brutales et impitoyables. »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich habe zum Unsterblichen für Eure rasche Rückkehr gebetet! Die Bewohner von Dargonus haben bis zum Schluss gekämpft, aber der Angriff der Feinde der Menschheit ... war gnadenlos und brutal."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich habe zum Unsterblichen für Eure rasche Rückkehr gebetet! Die Bewohner von Dargonus haben bis zum Schluss gekämpft, aber der Angriff der Feinde der Menschheit ... war gnadenlos und brutal."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir an evvel geri dönmeniz için Ölümsüz'e yalvardım. Dargonus halkı kanının son damlasına kadar savaştı... Fakat İnsanlığın düşmanları feci bir katliam yaptı."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've been praying to the Immortal One for your swift return! The people of Dargonus fought to the last, but the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity... was vicious and brutal."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir an evvel geri dönmeniz için Ölümsüz'e yalvardım. Dargonus halkı kanının son damlasına kadar savaştı... Fakat İnsanlığın düşmanları feci bir katliam yaptı."
